summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 WINNEBAGO ADVENTURER RV EQUIPPED WITH A 2009 FORD MP STRIPPED CHASSIS. THE VEHICLE WAS PARKED WHEN THE CONTACT EXPERIENCED DIFFICULTY ACCESSING THE INSIDE DUAL TIRE TO CHECK THE AIR PRESSURE. THE MANUFACTURER STATED THAT THEY WERE UNABLE TO PROVIDE ANY ASSISTANCE. THE CONTACT WAS DISPLEASED TO KNOW THAT THE MANUFACTURER OF THE CHASSIS DID NOT DESIGN THE VEHICLE PROPERLY TO ACCESS THE INSIDE DUAL TIRE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 1,700. UPDATED 07/21/10. *LJ    UPDATED 10/22/10  *BF  UPDATED 10/26/10*JB
